channel.title: 工具 on 滑稽。
channel.description: Recent content in 工具 on 滑稽。

item.title: 自己搭梯子科学上网-shadowsocks
item.description: 基于 阿里云香港服务器 系统 centos7.3 1. 使用repo安装shadowsocks-libev wget https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/librehat/shadowsocks/repo/epel-7/librehat-shadowsocks-epel-7.repo mv librehat-shadowsocks-epel-7.repo /etc/yum.repos.d/ yum install epel-release -y yum install gcc gettext autoconf libtool automake make pcre-devel asciidoc xmlto c-ares-devel libev-devel libsodium-devel mbedtls-devel -y yum install shadowsocks-libev ２．配
